name: Not The VASE
description:
Keep the Vase in the infinite free fall for as long as possible

Multiple play modes and options
- play top down, with the view of the Vase

- play with the camera following the Vase

- play with the camera static watching the Vase

- play controlling the portals rather than the Vase

- play any mode with a changing glowing back wall, creates a nice silhouette
- the ability to disable the glowing wall

Controls
A and D to move left and right | or arrow keys
Mouse wheel to zoom
